name: datashelf-product-explorer
description: A comprehensive product data exploration platform for World of Books

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:database && npm run install:scraper && npm run install:api && npm run install:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:scraper" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:database && npm run build:scraper && npm run build:api && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:database && npm run test:scraper && npm run test:api && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:scraper && npm run lint:api && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules database/node_modules scraper/node_modules api/node_modules frontend/node_modules
